title: Message to the American Bible Society on Universal Bible Sunday.
text:
My dear Mr. Brown:

I am interested to know that December 6th is to be observed as Universal Bible Sunday. Our institutions and common life are grounded in spiritual ideals. I hope that the observation of Bible Sunday will quicken the spiritual impulses of our people and contribute to the spiritual advancement which underlies our stability, service and progress as a nation and as individuals. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. George W. Brown, General Secretary, American Bible Society, Bible House, Astor Place, New York City]
